title: nexomis/viral-variant pipeline parameters
description: Calling variants with peptide impact and comparison between samples (via transfer annotation): From assembled genome, reference genome with its annotation and mapping of reads on assembled genome.

input_output_options.title: input/output
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples you would like to analyse.

refs.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the references to be used for each batch

save_bam_after_indel_realn.description: Save mapping files after indels realignement.

out_dir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved (must not already exist).

biocontainers_registry.description: Biocontainers registry of docker images. Note: Does not applied to every containers process

min_avg_qual.description: Minimum average quality to keep a read.

min_len.description: Minimum length to keep a read.

cut_right_window_size.description: The window size for sliding window trimming on the right.

cut_right_mean_qual.description: The mean quality requirement for sliding window trimming on the right.

cut_tail_window_size.description: The window size for sliding window trimming on the tail.

cut_tail_mean_qual.description: The mean quality requirement for sliding window trimming on the tail.

tax_dir.description: Path to a custom taxonomy directory for recentrifuge.

num_reads_sample_qc.description: Number of reads to subsample before kraken2 and fastqc

variant_calling.title: Variant calling
variant_calling.description: Options for variant calling of interest genome

args_bwamem.description: BWA-mem mapping args. Ignored if 'mapper' is not 'bwa-mem'. Default is '-M' in order to ensure Picard MarkDuplicates compatibility (force single primary alignment by reads, even if reads are splited and map independantly ; probably not ideal in all context).

args_bowtie2.description: Bowtie2 mapping args. Ignored if 'mapper' is not 'bowtie2'.

args_samtools_mpileup_variant.description: 'samtools mpileup' args for variant calling. Options already included and cannot be amended '-aa -A -B -Q 0'

min_dp_variant.description: Minimum depth threshold for a position to be included in the filtered file of detected variants.

ref_ratio_threshold_variant.description: Ratio threshold of reference allele representation below which the position can be included in the filtered file of detected variants.

alt_ratio_threshold_variant.description: Ratio threshold of alternate allele representation about which the position can be included in the filtered file of detected variants.  Note: an SNV will only be considered as passing the filters if it validates all the criteria (e.g. with parameters set to 'alt_ratio_threshold_variant=0.01' and 'ref_ratio_threshold_variant=0.95' a position that would have, for example, 'REF_FREQ=0.94' with 10 alternative alleles of the same frequency (< 0.01) would not pass the filters). It is recommended to at least set this threshold a little higher than the probability of error (obtained with 'samtools stats' or estimated according to the average QScore of the bases/reads (for example double of probability corresponding to the average QScore, which gives '0.002' for Q30).

resources_options.title: Resources options
resources_options.description: Define The default resources for nextflow

ncpus_low.description: Number of cpu for low process.

ncpus_med.description: Number of cpu for medium process.

ncpus_high.description: Number of cpu for high process.

kraken2_memory.description: Amount of memory in GB for Kraken2, default is 12 GB.
